ESFA funded adult education budget 2018 to 2019

Total 2018 to 2019 allocation

£3,225,520

How we calculate this

Could my allocation change?

We can reduce or remove your allocation if there's evidence that public funds are at risk.

Allocation statements are not legally binding. They do not create any legal obligation against the Secretary of State for Education, acting through the Education and Skills Funding Agency.

ESFA funded adult education budget grant

August 2018 to March 2019 £1,316,053
April 2019 to July 2019 £1,678,788
Total ESFA funded adult education budget grant £2,994,841
How your ESFA funded adult education budget grant is broken down
19 to 24 traineeships allocation £648,710
Adult skills allocation £781,795
Community learning allocation £715,010
Continuing learners in a devolved area £0
Continuing learners outside a devolved area £849,326

ESFA funded adult education budget contract for service

August 2018 to March 2019 £154,833
April 2019 to July 2019 £75,846
Total ESFA funded adult education budget contract for service £230,679
How your ESFA funded adult education budget contract for service is broken down
19 to 24 traineeships allocation £58,669
Adult skills allocation £63,000
Continuing learners in a devolved area £52,751
Continuing learners outside a devolved area £0
Learner support allocation £56,259
Total 2018 to 2019 allocation £3,225,520

Download these ESFA funded adult education budget allocation values (PDF, 179KB)

Email pds.mailbox@education.gov.uk to ask for a different format.
